13.title: Request count (sum)
13.query:

|filter url_map_name!=""
|fields url_map_name, request_count=arraySum(sum)
|sort request_count desc
|limit toLong($top)

61.title: Request count (sum)

| filter startswith(response_code, "4")
|filter url_map_name!=""
|fields backend_name, response_code, gcp.project.id,`dt.entity.cloud:gcp:https_lb`,`dt.entity.cloud:gcp:project`, url_map_name, request_count=arraySum(sum)
|sort request_count desc
|limit toLong($top)

69.content:
## Link
click on `gcp.project.id` or on `url_map_name` + **[] Open with** + **Cloud**

70.title: HTTPs Load Balancing - Ingress
70.query:
timeseries{ request_count=sum(`cloud.gcp.loadbalancing_googleapis_com.https.request_count`),
  request_bytes=sum(`cloud.gcp.loadbalancing_googleapis_com.https.request_bytes_count`),
  response_bytes=sum(`cloud.gcp.loadbalancing_googleapis_com.https.response_bytes_count`),
  backend_request_count=sum(`cloud.gcp.loadbalancing_googleapis_com.https.backend_request_count`),
  backend_request_bytes_count=sum(`cloud.gcp.loadbalancing_googleapis_com.https.backend_request_bytes_count`)
  }, 
  by:{url_map_name, gcp.project.id,`dt.entity.cloud:gcp:https_lb`,`dt.entity.cloud:gcp:project`}, filter:in(gcp.project.id, $gcp_project_id)
|filter url_map_name!=""
|fields  gcp.project.id,`dt.entity.cloud:gcp:project`, url_map_name, `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:https_lb`, `request_count (sum)`=arraySum(request_count), `request_bytes (sum)`=arraySum(request_bytes), `response_bytes (sum)`=arraySum(response_bytes), `backend_request_count (sum)`=arraySum(backend_request_count), `backend_request_bytes_count (sum)`=arraySum(backend_request_bytes_count)
|sort `request_count (sum)` desc
|limit toLong($top)

73.title: Request count (sum)
73.query:
timeseries sum=sum(`cloud.gcp.loadbalancing_googleapis_com.https.request_count`), by:{backend_name,response_code,url_map_name,gcp.project.id ,`dt.entity.cloud:gcp:https_lb`,`dt.entity.cloud:gcp:project`}, filter:in(gcp.project.id, $gcp_project_id)
| filter startswith(response_code, "5")
|filter url_map_name!=""
|fields backend_name, response_code, gcp.project.id,`dt.entity.cloud:gcp:https_lb`,`dt.entity.cloud:gcp:project`, url_map_name, request_count=arraySum(sum)
|sort request_count desc
|limit toLong($top)

75.content:
Application Load Balancers can balance HTTP and HTTPS traffic across multiple backend instances, across multiple regions.

GCP metrics are filtered by `gcp_project_id`, splitted by some dimension(s) and aggregated by 
- `sum` = sum of period and the other dimensions (example `count`), or
- `avg` = average over the period and over the other dimensions (example `latency`).
